author: newsr.in
title: Everything Lenovo and Motorola unveiled today at Europe’s biggest electronics conference
text: The holidays are just around the corner — not really — and Lenovo/Motorola took the stage at the IFA consumer electronics show in Berlin today to unveil its next generation of computers, tablets, phones, and smartwatches. Here’s everything the Chinese company wants you to put on your wish list this year. The new Moto 360 and Moto 360 Sport […] »
